markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Night Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=1345) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dhampir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=215" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 33 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can tap into the magic that runs through your blood. You gain [_animal form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=10) (wolf only, using the statistics for a canine) and [_obscuring mist_](/Spells.aspx?ID=210) as 2nd-level divine innate spells. You can cast each of these spells once per day.
name: Night Magic

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 9" pfs="Standard" > Night Magic Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 33 2.0 --- You can tap into the magic that runs through your blood. You gain animal form (wolf only, using the statistics for a canine) and obscuring mist as 2nd-level divine innate spells. You can cast each of these spells once per day.
